pageHeader.subtitle: >- One million CDROMs distributed throughout Walmart stores to promote the ACM awards. Produced for both the 2002 and 2004 events.
pageHeader.description: >- Dr Pepper was a major sponsor of the Academy of Country Music Awards. They wanted a marketing piece in the form of a CDROM to be distributed throughout Walmart stores. We created content that included games, videos, and musical toys related to the Academy of Country Music Awards. The finished disks were placed in displays and included free with the purchase of Dr Pepper products.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
